videos.description: Carmelo Anthony joins an illustrious list of NBA superstars with 25,000 career points.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Melo reaches 25k point milestone ) 2018/1/27 ESHEET ODV ENHL

videos.headline: Melo reaches 25K milestone
